examples: a critical time in the school's history

definitions.text: a record or narrative description of past events
examples: he gave an inaccurate account of the plot to kill the president
the story of exposure to lead

definitions.text: the discipline that records and interprets past events involving human beings
the continuum of events occurring in succession leading from the past to the present and even into the future
all that is remembered of the past as preserved in writing; a body of knowledge
